items.title: Who is Robert Prevost, the new Pope Leo XIV?
items.description: After a conclave that lasted only three sessions and 24 hours, 133 cardinals have elected Robert Prevost, now known as Pope Leo XIV.

items.title: Watch Pope Leo XIV's first public address - in full
items.description: Speaking from the Vatican balcony just after being unveiled as the new pontiff, he paid tribute to his predecessor and called for unity.

items.title: Charity linked to Prince Harry admits human rights abuses in Congo park
items.description: African Parks acknowledged its rangers committed human rights abuses in Congo-Brazzaville.

items.title: Watch: Moment white smoke billows, signalling a new pope's election
items.description: American Robert Prevost was later announced as the new pope, and will be known as Pope Leo XIV.

items.title: Bill Gates plans to give away most of his fortune by 2045
items.description: Microsoft founder said he will speed up his charitable giving - and accused Elon Musk and Doge of "killing children" through aid cuts.
